content: That's really helpful, thank you! I think I can definitely fit in the HubSpot Content Marketing Certification into my schedule, and maybe even start with that one first. For Coursera's Digital Marketing Specialization, I might need to plan a bit more ahead, but it's definitely doable. Do you think these courses will help me transition into a more specialized role, such as a Content Marketing Strategist or a Digital Marketing Consultant, which I've been considering?
